author: ShadyTidus
description: Karaoke Downloader with interactive search via DMs. Supports both prefix commands and slash commands. Requires API token configuration by bot owner.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the Karaoke Cog! IMPORTANT: Bot owner must set the API token using `[p]setkaraoketoken <token>` before use. Use `/ksearch` (slash command) to search for karaoke videos.
name: Karaoke
short: Karaoke downloader with slash command support.
